TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileProviderCollection Inherits SettingsProviderCollection

summary.span: 继承 抽象类的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的配置文件提供程序通过类的属性以只读方式公开 。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的用户配置文件属性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它还允许您访问不是抽象类的成员的特定配置文件提供程序的成员 。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序以及其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/Providerscs.aspx#9)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/Providersvb.aspx#9)]

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

summary.span: 创建一个新的空配置文件提供程序集合。

span.span: Creates a new, empty profile provider collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中使用此构造函数。This constructor is not intended to be used from your code. 应用程序的配置文件提供程序通过类的属性以只读方式公开 。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase provider) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (provider As ProviderBase)

param.name: provider
param.span: 要添加到该集合中的配置文件提供程序。

span.span: The profile provider to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将一个配置文件提供程序添加到该集合中。

span.span: Adds a profile provider to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不适于在您的代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 配置文件提供程序实例将使用配置文件 `ProfileProviderCollection` 配置元素的[profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema) 部分的 provider 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v=vs.100))添加到[profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))应用程序的。Profile provider instances are added to the `ProfileProviderCollection` for an application using the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v=vs.100)) section of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 可以使用类的属性访问配置文件提供程序集合 。You can access the profile provider collection using the property of the class.

exception.span: 的类型不是继承 抽象类的类型。

span.span: is not of a type that inherits the abstract class.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的配置文件提供程序通过类的属性以只读方式公开 。The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only through the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的用户配置文件属性。This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application. 它还允许您访问不是抽象类的成员的特定配置文件提供程序的成员 。It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the abstract class.
